contest-event.event-date:
June 18, 2016 D Eidgenössisches Musikfest (Marschmusik CS & 1st)
Eidgenössisches Musikfest (Marschmusik) 80 March Contest Eidgenössisches Musikfest eidgenossisches-musikfest-marschmusik
Montreux, VD, Switzerland Each Band prep. 2 Marches, Jury decided which one to play (same Mode like 1st Weekend) > held on June 17th - 19th [including 5 Bands from Unterhaltungsmusik Brass Band] Draws till 17 played ond Friday, then till 161 on Saturday, finally till 275 on Sunday.
Ranking 2nd Weekend (Draw was an over all incl. Evolutions - ranked Sections CS-1st but sep. Brass/Wind). A Few Bands couldn't play due to Rain. Bands played on the 3 following Marching Routes (route de defilée): Parcours 'Roussy', La Tour-de-Peilz (marked C); Parcours 'Mercury', Montreux (M) and Parcours 'Stravinski', Montreux (S) > Routes are dedicated to the Queen-Musician Freddie Mercury and the 'new Music'- Pioneer Igor Stravinski.
Jury C (26 Bands): Roger Hasler, Marc-André Barras, Daniel Kern Jury M (85 Bands + 15 Bands with Evolutions): Patrick Robatel, Johanna Begert, Heinz Binder & Philipp Rütsche, Josef Fink, Bernhard Meier Jury S (139 Bands): see above
June 16, 2013, 9:33 a.m. Sept. 23, 2016, 9:19 a.m.
